body: Pretty sure he still has the upper hand in this, especially if he has a copy of the file in his computer. He can also ruin both the woman and the teacher's reputation by spreading rumors and if anyone questions the authenticity, then he can show them the pictures. Or maybe just show the picture to the principal to get the teacher's license revoked. But of course, this is a fvcking hentai and logic is not present in this.
Pretty sure teacher fucking student is far more inflammatory. But lols, what a fucking scrub, he deserves his epic fail with the way he allowed this to happen.
